canvases.label: Moyo Hinagata Nanba no ume, Vol.2, 1886
Moyo Hinagata Nanba no ume, Vol.2, 1886

metadata.value: Published in Tokyo during the Meiji Period (1868-1912) in 1886, the Moyo? hinagata Nanba no ume is a Kimono pattern book or Hinagata-bon, literally meaning "design prints . It is has a traditional oriental format, on double leaves and is illustrated with coloured woodcuts.
metadata.label: Description
